properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:27PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for
the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina...

Cape Fear At Lock And Dam 1 affecting Bladen County
Little Pee Dee At Galivants Ferry affecting Dillon...Horry and Marion Counties

...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers in North Carolina...
Lumber Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County

The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Cape Fear At Lock And Dam 1.
* from Tuesday morning until further notice.
* At  8:45 PM Thursday the stage was 18.55 feet.
* Flood stage is 24.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Tuesday morning and continue to rise
to near 24.2 feet by Tuesday evening. Additional rises are possible
thereafter.
* Impact...At 24.0 feet...Lowland flooding will occur along the riverbed.
properties.instruction:
People with interests along the river should take the necessary precautions to
protect life and property from the flood waters.

Additional information is available on our website at weather.gov/ilm under the
"Rivers and Lakes" link.
